name: Memoirs of Murder: Behind the Scenes Collector's Edition
name_original: Memoirs of Murder: Behind the Scenes Collector's Edition
description:
Memoirs of Murder: Behind the Scenes Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Eipix Entertainment. It came out on 31-08-2019. It was published by Big Fish Games. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Memoirs of Murder: Behind the Scenes Collector's Edition on PC.
